Package com.sri.ai.grinder.helper

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignmentMapsIterator
    An iterator over maps from variables to their possible values according to their Type as defined in a Registry.
    AssignmentsIterator
    An iterator over assignments to expressions according to their Type as defined in a Registry.
    AssignmentsSamplingIterator
    An assignments iterator that samples over the space of possible assignments.
    BruteForceFallbackQuantifierEliminationStepSolver
    Wraps a base SingleQuantifierEliminationStepSolver into another one that solves the problem by brute force when the base one cannot.
    FallbackQuantifierEliminationStepSolver  
    FunctionBasedStepSolver
    A context-dependent expression problem step solver based on applying a given function to the result of another context-dependent expression problem step solver.
    FunctionSignature
    A function signature containing a name and corresponding arity.
    GetType
    A Function version of looking up an expression's type given a registry.
    GrinderUtil
    General purpose utility routines related to grinder libraries.
    IsApplicationOf
    A Predicate that determines if a given expression on application has the functor specified on instantiation.
    IsolateUtil
    Utility methods for isolating a generalized linear variable.
    LazySampledFunction  
    LazySampledFunctionApplicationTopRewriter
    A TopRewriter that rewrites an expression to its value if it is a LazySampledFunction application, or delegates its rewriting to a given base TopRewriter otherwise.
    LazySampledFunctionType  
    MaximumExpressionStepSolver
    A context-dependent problem step solver deciding which in a set of expressions is the maximum one given an order.
    RewriterWithPrinting  
    SelectExpressionsSatisfyingComparisonStepSolver
    A context-dependent problem step solver deciding which in a set of expressions that satisfy a comparison according to a given functor and bound.
    UniquelyNamedConstantAreAllSymbolsNotIn
    A predicate indicating that uniquely named constants are all symbols not in a given collection.
    UniquelyNamedConstantIncludingBooleansAndNumbersPredicate
    A predicate based on a set of given uniquely named constants (symbols) that also implicitly include numbers and boolean constants as uniquely named constants.
